name: Newcastlemagpiescast
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: new castle magpies cast
Developer Terms of Use
des:
We share live updates and opinions about football club Newcastle. We cover game result, fan opinions, recent issue and news about the club

[How to use]
You can say, “Alexa, open New castle magpies cast” to hear the latest stories. While listening to a story, you can say ”Alexa, stop” to stop the story. You can continue to the next story by answering “Yes” to the question “Would you like to read the next post?"

Example phrase:
"Alexa, open New castle magpies cast"

[Dialogue flow]
a. The Skill will play its welcome message upon hearing the user’s command, “Alexa, open New castle magpies cast."
b. The Skill will automatically play the most recent posting from the open New castle magpies castguru board from wecast.ai.
c.After playing the most recent post, the Skill will ask “Would you like to read the next post?”
- If the listener says “Yes”, the Skill will play the next posting
- If the listener says “No”, the Skill will exit the Skill
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
